Description: Fragment of a blue and white glazed composition tile.
Curator's comments: Colourful faience inlays were a feature of house, temple and palace decoration at Tell el-Amarna. See, for example: Fairman, City of Akhenaten II (London, 1933): pl.30 Pendlebury, City of Akhenaten III (London, 1951): pls.62, 72 Pharaohs of the Sun (exhibition catalogue, Boston, 1999): 228
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
